data.title: CONTENTdm
data.meta_description: Dr. George R. Minot of Harvard Medical School and Boston City Hospital with co-winner of Nobel Prize, Dr. Murphy of Boston and Dr. Whipple of Rochester. Minot in laboratory where he discovered that liver would help treat pernicious anemia. Minot shown examining blood solutions in vials and graduates, followed by a visitation with a patient.
